alias.title: Credential Alias
alias.description: Friendly identifier for this AWS integration.

roleArn.title: IAM Role ARN
roleArn.description: Role assumed to query Audit Manager and Systems Manager data.

externalId.title: External ID
externalId.description: Optional external ID required by the delegated role.

region.title: Default Region
region.description: AWS region used for audit and compliance queries.

sessionDuration.title: Session Duration
sessionDuration.description: Optional session duration (Go duration string, e.g. 1h30m).

sessionName.title: Session Name
sessionName.description: Optional session name override for STS AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity calls.

accessKeyId.title: Access Key ID
accessKeyId.description: Optional static credentials if role assumption is not available.

secretAccessKey.title: Secret Access Key
secretAccessKey.description: Optional static credentials if role assumption is not available.

sessionToken.title: Session Token
sessionToken.description: Optional session token paired with the static credentials.

auditManagerAssessmentId.title: Audit Manager Assessment ID
auditManagerAssessmentId.description: Optional assessment identifier to scope evidence pulls.

systemsManagerDocument.title: Systems Manager Document
systemsManagerDocument.description: Optional SSM document used when triggering compliance scans.

configAggregatorName.title: AWS Config Aggregator
configAggregatorName.description: Aggregator name that should be queried for compliance status.

controlTowerRegions.title: Regions to Inspect
controlTowerRegions.description: Optional list of AWS regions that should be included when evaluating compliance.

tags.title: Default Tags
tags.description: Optional key/value map added to generated integrations for traceability.
